    Tree Arithmetic with Phylogenetic Flows
  • Blog

    Get only the tip elements of a pfc

    pf_tips.Rd

    Get only the tip elements of a pfc

    Usage

    pf_tips(x)

    Arguments

    x

    A pfc object

    Value

    A pfc object with only tip elements

    Examples

    pf_tips(rpfc(100))
#> <pfc<e:198>[100]>
#> First  10 phylogenetic flows: 
#> [1] ◎──1.628──→ Node2 ──0.756──→ Node23 ──0.017──→ Node30 ──0.047──→ t93 
#> 
#> [2] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0084──→ Node55 ──0.0130──→ Node82 ──0.0063──→ t13 
#> 
#> [3] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0084──→ Node55 ──0.0130──→ Node82 ──0.0063──→ t98 
#> 
#> [4] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0084──→ Node55 ──0.0193──→ t56 
#> 
#> [5] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0077──→ Node54 ──0.0084──→ Node72 ──0.0117──→ t61 
#> 
#> [6] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0077──→ Node54 ──0.0084──→ Node72 ──0.0117──→ t82 
#> 
#> [7] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0077──→ Node54 ──0.0137──→ Node83 ──0.0063──→ t49 
#> 
#> [8] ◎──1.6278──→ Node2 ──0.7559──→ Node23 ──0.0167──→ Node30 ──0.0190──→ Node43 ──0.0077──→ Node54 ──0.0137──→ Node83 ──0.0063──→ t45 
#> 
#> [9] ◎──1.628──→ Node2 ──0.756──→ Node23 ──0.063──→ t68 
#> 
#> [10] ◎──1.628──→ Node2 ──0.376──→ Node4 ──0.366──→ Node17 ──0.077──→ t89
